actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to eliminate the asset criteria for the needs test under the guaranteed student loan program.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to direct the Secretary of Education to exclude the amount of the assets of the student and the assets of the student's family from the determination of expected family contribution for the determination of need under the guaranteed student loan program, for any academic year beginning after academic year 1983-1984.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate the asset criteria for the needs test under the guaranteed student loan program.
